metadata.Title: CVE-2021-40942 on Ubuntu 22.10 (kinetic) - medium.
metadata.Description:
In GPAC MP4Box v1.1.0, there is a heap-buffer-overflow in the function filter_parse_dyn_args function in filter_core/filter.c:1454, as demonstrated by GPAC. This can cause a denial of service (DOS).

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2021-40942` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

gpac - 2.0.0+dfsg1-2
gpac-modules-base - 2.0.0+dfsg1-2
libgpac11 - 2.0.0+dfsg1-2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: gpac package in kinetic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.0.0+dfsg1-2').
